description: This file defines a React functional component called PreviewPage, which renders a full-window preview of HTML content generated elsewhere. It includes logic to reset body styles, retrieve current HTML from a chat state store, sanitize it, and display either the sanitized content inside an iframe or a placeholder message if content is empty.

methods.name: PreviewPage()
methods.description: React functional component that manages body style reset, retrieves and sanitizes HTML content, and renders it in a full-window iframe or placeholder message.
